comments: One of the most helpful and understanding professors in the department. Knows his stuff and knows how tough the life of a student can get with a full class load. Expects the world from his students but is willing to go the extra mile to help them achieve it. Would be a great permanent edition!!

One of the best professors in the department. Very helpful, clear, and knowledgeable. Spends a lot of time outside of class helping students. Passionate about the subject, and if you put the time in, you will learn a lot! Attending open lab is highly recommended. Put some time and effort into your grinder and you will do well!

Dr. Erickson is a phenomenal professor!! I can\'t believe he has not been hired full time yet. This class is awesome! It is a huge amount of work but as long as you attend open lab and work as much as possible you will do fine. This man oozes wisdom and I love any opportunity I have to talk to him about literally anything! You will LEARN!
Hes very reasonable and helpful with everything. He doesn\'t do the work for you but shows you how to complete it and hes a very fair grader

Every time I talk to this man I learn something new. He really has a passion for what he does and consistently works long hours in order to help his students on an individual level. I definitely recommend any class that he offers. If you are really trying to enhance your skills, take this prof. JE - CD
Simply a great professor. Helpful, clear, and enthusiastic. Definitely take him
Such a chill teacher...If you need help hes there for you and if ur lucky he\'ll do it for you... Great teacher to bad he might be leaving :(

I thought I was going to HATE this class. But Dr. Erickson was so happy to be there and loves what he\'s doing that it made me start to love what I was doing. He was so helpful, everything I asked of him, he delivered. The best professor I\'ve ever had, by far.

Strong passion for teaching and is dang good at it. His classroom is filled with a fun learning environment that drives students to want to learn and encouraged to do their best. I knew practically nothing about metal working, but thru hard work and his great teaching ability, I learned so many new things and really enjoy coming to class. Thx E -DD
Great teacher. I have so much respect for the guy. Comes to class with enthusiasm everyday, even at 745am. So helpful with everything. Great guy and fun class. Go to open labs though. AD

Erickson is a GREAT teacher. I cannot wait to take another of his classes. Extremely helpful! Loved the class, he made the lectures interesting and showed us the concepts in the lab that he lectured on. DG 130
He is a great teacher, he takes a lot of time in and out of class to work with students on a personal basis. Go to open labs as often as you can it is a great opportunity to get work done.

Dr. Erickson is hands down one of the best teachers I have ever had. He is extremely patient, and keeps his cool. He takes the time to help you one on one no matter how many people have asked him the same exact question. I highly recommend taking as many classes with him as possible.

Dr. Erickson is a great professor. He dedicates more time to his students than nearly everyone else. If you have an oppertunity to take one of his classes, do it. There is a lot of work to do, but he will be there to help you along the way.

Very good professor. Enjoyable and easy to work with. If you have a problem or an idea, he will gladly listen to you and work with you. I would highly recommend him and change classes for him. Very little book work and short lectures. Alot of lab time.

This has to be one of my favorite professors at millersville. He will just about do anything to help you on your project in the class. Even taking time out of his own to let you in the lab. Defidently RECOMMEND this professor! Book is used for homework and please DO IT. Its informational and its helps your grade.

Possibly the best prof. ever. He goes out of his way to not only give you lab time, but to make sure you understand every step in the metal working process. I would definitely take him again for another class.
